Title: Relates to the provision of regulatory information to small businesses
Summary: Relates to the provision of regulatory information to small businesses through the establishment of a small business regulatory nexus by certain agencies.
LawCode: Add ยง102-c, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to the provision of regulatory information to small businesses through the establishment of a small business regulatory nexus by certain agencies
